author: Tamara Williamson
subject: Hello.
body:
Hey,

I just joined a few weeks ago and finally got in. =).

For the very few that I have met, my name is Tamara (hi Luis and congrats), I work in the video game industry, and have been a fan for about a year now (no thanks to my boyfriend). *L*

Hope to hear more from folks! Take care

Tam
